phone2:
1. Set brightness ☼ to max or auto.
2. Put the browser in fullscreen mode:
   iPhone: If tabs and the address bar are visible at the top: Go to Settings -> Safari, and turn “Show Tab Bar” off.
   Android: Double-tap on the screen for fullscreen display.
3. Hold your mobile screen horizontally. If the image doesn’t follow, ensure portrait orientation lock is off. ↺
4. Adjust the volume so you can hear well.
outro1:
This is the end of the tour of Kvarnbyn.
If you have borrowed equipment, please go and return it now.
If you would like to know more about Kvarnbyn, welcome to Mölndals Stadsmuseum



Want to discover more places in Mölndal? Continue your tour at www.entermolndal.se
